sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PAYR0480 ( DPOB_CD , PAY_EXTPY_CD , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , PAY_EXTPY_GRP_CD , PAY_EXTPY_NM , PAY_EXTPY_PYMT_PRD_DIV_CD , PAY_EXTPY_USE_YN , PAY_REVN_PSBY_YN , ACC_ACC_CD , SEVE_PAY_YN , YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #payExtpyCd# , #pymtDducDivCd# , #payExtpyGrpCd# , #payExtpyNm# , #payExtpyPymtPrdDivCd# , #payExtpyUseYn# , #payRevnPsbyYn# , #accAccCd# , #sevePayYn# , #yrtxFreeDtyReduCd# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PAYR0480 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , PAY_EXTPY_CD=#payExtpyCd# , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD=#pymtDducDivCd# , PAY_EXTPY_GRP_CD=#payExtpyGrpCd# , PAY_EXTPY_NM=#payExtpyNm# , PAY_EXTPY_PYMT_PRD_DIV_CD=#payExtpyPymtPrdDivCd# , PAY_EXTPY_USE_YN=#payExtpyUseYn# , PAY_REVN_PSBY_YN=#payRevnPsbyYn# , ACC_ACC_CD=#accAccCd# , SEVE_PAY_YN=#sevePayYn# , YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_CD=#yrtxFreeDtyReduCd# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_EXTPY_CD=#payExtpyCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PAYR0480 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_EXTPY_CD=#payExtpyCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , PAY_EXTPY_CD , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , PAY_EXTPY_GRP_CD , PAY_EXTPY_NM , PAY_EXTPY_PYMT_PRD_DIV_CD , PAY_EXTPY_USE_YN , PAY_REVN_PSBY_YN , ACC_ACC_CD , SEVE_PAY_YN , YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0480 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_EXTPY_CD=#payExtpyCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , PAY_EXTPY_CD , PAY_EXTPY_GRP_CD , PAY_EXTPY_GRP_CD AS payExtpyGrpCdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD,PAY_EXTPY_GRP_CD) AS payExtpyGrpCdcommCdNm , PAY_EXTPY_NM , PAY_EXTPY_PYMT_PRD_DIV_CD , PAY_EXTPY_PYMT_PRD_DIV_CD AS payExtpyPymtPrdDivCdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD,PAY_EXTPY_PYMT_PRD_DIV_CD) AS payExtpyPymtPrdDivCdcommCdNm , PAY_EXTPY_USE_YN , PAY_REVN_PSBY_YN , SEVE_PAY_YN , ACC_ACC_CD , YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_CD , YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_CD AS yrtxFreeDtyReduCdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD,YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_CD) AS yrtxFreeDtyReduCdcommCdNm , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD AS pymtDducDivCdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD,PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD) AS pymtDducDivCdcommCdNm , PAYR_TERM_USE_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0480 WHERE 1=1
PAY_EXTPY_GRP_CD = #payExtpyGrpCd#
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
PAY_EXTPY_NM LIKE '%' || #payExtpyNm# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD ASC ,PAY_EXTPY_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#
) A )

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PAYR0480 WHERE 1=1
PAY_EXTPY_GRP_CD = #payExtpyGrpCd#
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
PAY_EXTPY_NM LIKE '%' || #payExtpyNm# || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PAYR0480 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
